translation: Children, not the wise, speak of knowledge and the Yoga of action, or the performance of action, as though they are distinct and different; he who is truly established in one, obtains the fruits of both.
commentary: 5.4 Sankhya Yoga Sankhya (knowledge) and Yoga (Yoga of action or performance of action)? separate distinct? Children children? speak speak? Not not? The wise the wise? One one? Even even? established established in? Right truly? of both of both? finds obtains? phalam fruit.Commentary Children the ignorant people who have no knowledge of the Self? and who have only a theoretical knowledge of the scriptures.Children
